values.message:
=You are a source credibility analyst. Analyze these search results and assign credibility scores:

{{ JSON.stringify($input.all(), null, 2) }}

For each source, evaluate:
1. Authority & Expertise (domain reputation, author credentials)
2. Publication Date (recency, relevance)
3. Peer Review Status (academic review, editorial oversight)
4. Citation Count & Impact
5. Bias & Objectivity

Return JSON format:
{
  "sources": [
    {
      "url": "source_url",
      "title": "source_title",
      "credibility_score": 85,
      "credibility_factors": {
        "authority": 90,
        "recency": 80,
        "peer_review": 95,
        "citations": 75,
        "objectivity": 85
      },
      "source_type": "academic|news|industry|government",
      "reliability_notes": "Key factors affecting credibility"
    }
  ],
  "overall_source_quality": "high|medium|low",
  "quality_summary": "Overall assessment of source reliability"
}

nodes.name: Generate Follow-up Suggestions
nodes.notes: Strategic next steps for continued research

nodes.name: Generate Final Report
nodes.notes: Comprehensive research report with confidence ratings
